physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph in black-and-white that is enclosed by a white frame. Five sets of carom tables can be discerned in the photograph. They are surrounded by youths
 who are mostly boys. Some of these boys are holding cue sticks to hit the strikers. At the bottom of the photograph to the left hand side
 there is a designation of \\1/15\\. And at the bottom right hand side
subject_terms_1:there is a signature in Chinese characters.\ table games social issues
